languages.text: {n}Девушка указывает на контейнеры, стоящие перед ней. В одном сияет начищенная {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарская{/g} винтовка редкого образца, во втором — причудливый меч.{/n} "Вот я и делюсь — примите эти скромные дары в честь нашей столь удачно, хоть и внезапно, зародившейся дружбы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Девушка указывает на контейнеры, стоящие перед ней. В одном сияет начищенная {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарская{/g} винтовка редкого образца, во втором — причудливый меч.{/n} "Вот я и делюсь — примите эти скромные дары в честь нашей столь удачно, хоть и внезапно, зародившейся дружбы".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}She points at the containers in front of her. One contains a polished {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} rifle, a rare model, and the other holds an ornate sword.{/n} "I am sharing what I've gained with you — please accept these humble gifts in honour of our wildly successful, though suddenly struck, friendship."
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка указывает на контейнеры, стоящие перед ней. В одном сияет начищенная {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарская{/g} винтовка редкого образца, во втором — причудливый меч.{/n} "Вот я и делюсь — примите эти скромные дары в честь нашей столь удачно, хоть и внезапно, зародившейся дружбы".

One contains a polished {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} rifle, a rare model, and the other holds an ornate sword.{/n} "I am sharing what I've gained with you — please accept these humble gifts in honour of our wildly successful, though suddenly struck, friendship."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}她指着面前的小箱子，其中一个箱子里装着一把抛光过的{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}步枪，很罕见的型号。另一个箱子里，装着一把装饰华丽的长剑。{/n}“我希望能与你分享我的收获。请收下这些卑微的礼物，以此纪念我们疯狂的成就，以及突如其来的友谊。”
languages.original_text: {n}She points at the containers in front of her. One contains a polished {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} rifle, a rare model, and the other holds an ornate sword.{/n} "I am sharing what I've gained with you — please accept these humble gifts in honour of our wildly successful, though suddenly struck, friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}她指着面前的小箱子，其中一个箱子里装着一把抛光过的{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}步枪，很罕见的型号。另一个箱子里，装着一把装饰华丽的长剑。{/n}“我希望能与你分享我的收获。请收下这些卑微的礼物，以此纪念我们疯狂的成就，以及突如其来的友谊。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Señala a los contenedores que hay frente a ella. Uno guarda un rifle {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} pulido, un modelo raro, y el otro, una espada ornamentada.{/n} «Comparto lo que he ganado con usted. Acepte estos humildes regalos para honrar nuestra repentina pero extremadamente prolífera amistad».
languages.original_text: {n}She points at the containers in front of her. One contains a polished {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} rifle, a rare model, and the other holds an ornate sword.{/n} "I am sharing what I've gained with you — please accept these humble gifts in honour of our wildly successful, though suddenly struck, friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Señala a los contenedores que hay frente a ella. Uno guarda un rifle {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} pulido, un modelo raro, y el otro, una espada ornamentada.{/n} «Comparto lo que he ganado con usted. Acepte estos humildes regalos para honrar nuestra repentina pero extremadamente prolífera amistad».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは正面にある箱を指さす。箱のひとつには輝きを放つ珍しい型の{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}のライフルが、もうひとつには華美な装飾の剣が入っている。{/n}「あんたの協力で獲ったものはきちんと分けるわ。急なことだったけれど、あたしたちの美しい友情を祝して、この戦利品を受け取ってちょうだい」
languages.original_text: {n}She points at the containers in front of her. One contains a polished {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} rifle, a rare model, and the other holds an ornate sword.{/n} "I am sharing what I've gained with you — please accept these humble gifts in honour of our wildly successful, though suddenly struck, friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは正面にある箱を指さす。箱のひとつには輝きを放つ珍しい型の{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}のライフルが、もうひとつには華美な装飾の剣が入っている。{/n}「あんたの協力で獲ったものはきちんと分けるわ。急なことだったけれど、あたしたちの美しい友情を祝して、この戦利品を受け取ってちょうだい」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle désigne les caisses alignées devant elle. La première contient un fusil {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}aeldari{/g} rutilant, un modèle fort rare, et la deuxième une épée ouvragée.{/n} « J'aimerais partager mes gains avec vous. Veuillez accepter ces humbles cadeaux en l'honneur de notre alliance inattendue, mais ô combien profitable. »
languages.original_text: {n}She points at the containers in front of her. One contains a polished {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} rifle, a rare model, and the other holds an ornate sword.{/n} "I am sharing what I've gained with you — please accept these humble gifts in honour of our wildly successful, though suddenly struck, friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle désigne les caisses alignées devant elle. La première contient un fusil {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}aeldari{/g} rutilant, un modèle fort rare, et la deuxième une épée ouvragée.{/n} « J'aimerais partager mes gains avec vous. Veuillez accepter ces humbles cadeaux en l'honneur de notre alliance inattendue, mais ô combien profitable. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sie deutet auf die Behälter vor ihr. Einer enthält ein poliertes {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}-Gewehr, ein seltenes Modell, der andere ein verziertes Schwert.{/n} "Ich teile, was ich zusammen mit Euch erhalten habe – bitte nehmt diese bescheidenen Geschenke entgegen, zu Ehren unserer überaus erfolgreichen, wenn auch plötzlichen Freundschaft."
languages.original_text: {n}She points at the containers in front of her. One contains a polished {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} rifle, a rare model, and the other holds an ornate sword.{/n} "I am sharing what I've gained with you — please accept these humble gifts in honour of our wildly successful, though suddenly struck, friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie deutet auf die Behälter vor ihr. Einer enthält ein poliertes {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}-Gewehr, ein seltenes Modell, der andere ein verziertes Schwert.{/n} "Ich teile, was ich zusammen mit Euch erhalten habe – bitte nimmt diese bescheidenen Geschenke entgegen, zu Ehren unserer überaus erfolgreichen, wenn auch plötzlichen Freundschaft."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, önündeki konteynerlere işaret ediyor. Konteynerlerden birinin içinde cilalı ve nadir görülen modellerden bir {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} tüfeği, diğerindeyse şatafatlı bir kılıç duruyor.{/n} "Kazandıklarımı seninle paylaşıyorum... Lütfen inanılmaz başarılı ve bir o kadar da hızlı gelişen arkadaşlığımızın şerefine bu mütevazı hediyeleri kabul et."
languages.original_text: {n}She points at the containers in front of her. One contains a polished {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} rifle, a rare model, and the other holds an ornate sword.{/n} "I am sharing what I've gained with you — please accept these humble gifts in honour of our wildly successful, though suddenly struck, friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, önündeki konteynerlere işaret ediyor. Konteynerlerden birinin içinde cilalı ve nadir görülen modellerden bir {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} tüfeği, bir diğerindeyse şatafatlı bir kılıç duruyor.{/n} "Kazandıklarımı seninle paylaşıyorum... Lütfen inanılmaz başarılı ve bir o kadar da hızlı gelişen arkadaşlığımızın şerefine bu mütevazı hediyeleri kabul et."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
